column1: We best speak with the Council, and tell them.. a young Jew is speaking heresy towards the Economy.
I don't know. Is that good or not?!
Well, I, for one, believe in freedom of speech. â€¦Mmm but then again, I think they are racist.
Let's cool his hot temper with a fresh island song.
Yeah, it makes Jews into stereotypes.
Hey, that's right! If there is no future, then there'll be no people from the future to come back and take our jobs!
